• Login, Hasło
  • {{user.login}}, {{user.pass}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from '../services/api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-users', templateUrl: './users.component.html', styleUrls: ['./users.component.css'] }) export class UsersComponent implements OnInit { public users: any = []; constructor(private api:ApiService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.api.getUsers().subscribe((res: any) => { this.users = res; }) } }
